title: Totaled
description:
A 2015 Hugo Award Finalist
 Neuroscientist Margaret Hauri has two children to raise, and she's on the cusp of a scientific breakthrough. There's just one problem.   She's dead.   An experimental technology might buy her some time. Even if it works, will it be enough to save her?   Length: 5,000 words, a short story Genre: near future hard SF, drama Market: written for adults (no sex, no violence, occasional mild/moderate profanity)  Get it now or read for FREE with Kindle Unlimited!
author: Kary English
